normalized: afterwards, i had come to the operations room.
yesterday, i had specifically ordered hans to 『concentrate on the brainwashing and remodelling process』, however i was focused on the “catch” myself.

i had reviewed all of beatrice and kila’s available database, which included the recordings of their behaviour since they had entered the tristan and even their training videos, in the hopes of finding the real reason behind my discomfort.
however, i still hadn’t found any strange anomaly.
i was simply left with a discomforting feeling―― that the empress and the grim reaper were up to something nefarious.

name: bohgan
normalized: hmm…
i was probably concerning myself with it too much.
that is what i genuinely thought, as i stared at the monitor which was reflecting the images of the two women showing off their orgasmic gape-faces together.

name: hans
normalized: it is major hans.
may i?

name: bohgan
normalized: come in.

name: hans
normalized: excuse me.
hans entered the operations room.

name: bohgan
normalized: what is the matter?

name: hans
normalized: we have the results of the analysis, captain.

name: bohgan
normalized: and?
i leaned forward in anticipation.
i had ordered hans to scan and analyse the room of the two women thoroughly.
we had installed a surveillance camera in the guest-room covertly, in order to spy on them.
what was on it?
we could possibly figure out a solution to my “catch”, if that came to light.

name: bohgan
normalized: well, what is it?

name: hans
normalized: well… both beatrice and kila have been attempting to check the location of our ship.
apart from that, i traced quite a few signals of theirs trying to communicate with other ships.

name: hans
normalized: they failed due to the interference from our jamming signals, of course.
i had seen to that personally.

name: bohgan
normalized: hmm… even so…
the counter-measures that i had deployed were spot on.
the trump card of the mother-daughter witch-duo had been to ambush us using their armoured cavalry unit and, subsequently, seize control of this ship.
however, it was exceedingly difficult for them to predict our route, since they had been unable to even pinpoint our location due to the magnetic interference.
even if they did manage to get in contact with their armoured cavalry unit, their hopes of springing an ambush had been dashed.
i had pondered on it deeply and had come to the conclusion that the only option they had left was to set up an ambush near libra city, since our 「destination」 was the only thing which was fixed.
even if we altered our course, we would eventually end up passing that spot anyway, which meant that we were at a huge risk of being ambushed.
however, the personalities of the two women would be completely overwritten and they would be mere slaves of mine by then.
in other words, i will have won by that point.

name: bohgan
normalized: should we prepare ourselves for that unfortunate circumstance?

name: hans
normalized: however, i don’t understand.

name: bohgan
normalized: about what?

name: hans
normalized: i know that these two women want to get in touch with their unit, however, there was no need for them to act on it so secretively.
doesn’t that imply that they are, in fact, suspicious of us?
hans looked at me, puzzled.

name: bohgan
normalized: the magic of the clit-ring is working now.
although they are a mother-daughter pair, that is one dark secret that they will do anything to conceal from each other.
that is the only reason why they have been going about it secretively.

name: bohgan
normalized: they were possibly trying to get in contact with a hospital which could take those rings off for them, instead of using the services of my “friend”, which i had offered them before.

name: hans
normalized: that is nothing but a waste of time and effort.

name: bohgan
normalized: indeed, it is… kukukuku
hans and i chuckled on it a bit.

name: bohgan
normalized: speaking of which, what happened about the uproar surrounding the ghost-sighting.

name: hans
normalized: about that.
we have analysed the footage from the surveillance cameras, however we didn’t notice anything out of the ordinary.

name: bohgan
normalized: i don’t believe that to be much of a cause for concern as well, however, just to be absolutely certain…

name: bohgan
normalized: set up heat-detection sensors in the vicinity of the activity zone and in the surrounding zones as well, just for good measure.
be sure to not overlook even a rat.

name: hans
normalized: i agree, which is why i have already given the order to set them up, my lord.

name: bohgan
normalized: excellent work.
i praised my competent deputy.
we were now prepared to check up on any seemingly trivial event, based on the rumours circulating among our soldiers.
there would no more problems concerning that.
we were safe.
